  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085988</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Working together to get writing right</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammen arbeiten, zum des Schreiben Rechtes zu 
erhalten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travailler ensemble pour obtenir la droite 
d'écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalhar junto para começar a direita da 
escrita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzionamento insieme per ottenere destra di 
scrittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να εργαστεί για να πάρει μαζί να γράψει δεξιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo junto para conseguir la derecha de la 
escritura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Philosophical and practical reasons to support writing across the curriculum in high schools. A WebQuest for teachers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Philosophische und praktische Gründe, Schreiben 
über dem Lehrplan in den High School zu unterstützen. Ein 
WebQuest für Lehrer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Raisons philosophiques et pratiques de supporter 
l'écriture à travers le programme d'études dans les lycées. 
Un WebQuest pour des professeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Razões filosóficas e práticas suportar a 
escrita através do curriculum em High Schools. Um WebQuest para
professores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Motivi filosofici e pratici sostenere scrittura 
attraverso il programma di studi in High Schooi. Un WebQuest per
gli insegnanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φιλοσοφικοί και πρακτικοί λόγοι να υποστηριχθεί το 
γράψιμο πέρα από το πρόγραμμα σπουδών στα γυμνάσια. Ένα 
WebQuest για τους δασκάλους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Razones filosóficas y prácticas de utilizar la 
escritura a través del plan de estudios en High Schools secundarias. 
Un WebQuest para los profesores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
